FAQ

  • Result values (objects) returned by action methods are passed by reference to result filters and RequestEnd middlwares, if one of your result filter mutates the object then the mutated object reflects in other filters. Highly recommended to perform read-only operations on result values.
  • endpoint and action method are used interchangeably.
  • Dinoloop creates .dino property on response.locals of expressjs for maintaining the state across request. Do not override response.locals or response.locals.dino which would give undesired results.
